explanation: Whisper, Shout, Scream, and Mumble are all actions that involve *producing* or *emitting* vocal sounds. 'Listen' is the act of *perceiving* or *receiving* sound, not creating it.

category: Original Seven Wonders of the Ancient World (no longer standing)
explanation: All tokens are from the traditional list of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. The Hanging Gardens, Statue of Zeus, Colossus of Rhodes, and Lighthouse of Alexandria have all been destroyed or fallen into ruin. The Great Pyramid of Giza is the only one that largely stands today.

Four of the words (Knot, Carat, Cent, Hertz) are units of measurement that also have common, distinct homophones which are not units of measurement (e.g., knot/not, carat/carrot, cent/scent, hertz/hurts). 'Mile' is a unit of measurement but does not have such a common homophone.
